description:
As a product leader
  I want the coach to follow the Product Strategy Research Playbook
  So that I receive structured and effective strategic guidance

steps.name: I am logged in as an organization member
I have started a new coaching conversation
the conversation should be in the "discovery" phase
the coach should ask about my organization context
the coach should explore my strategic challenges
I am logged in as an organization member
I have started a new coaching conversation
I have completed the discovery phase
the conversation should move to the "research" phase
the coach should introduce the three research pillars:

elements.name: Coach helps with macro market research

steps.name: I am logged in as an organization member
I have started a new coaching conversation
I am in the research phase
I discuss macro market topics
the coach should ask about:
I am logged in as an organization member
I have started a new coaching conversation
I am in the research phase
I discuss customer research
the coach should ask about:
I am logged in as an organization member
I have started a new coaching conversation
I am in the research phase
I discuss colleague research
the coach should ask about:
I am logged in as an organization member
I have started a new coaching conversation
I have completed research on all three pillars
the conversation should move to the "synthesis" phase
the coach should help synthesize insights
the coach should help formulate strategic bets
I am logged in as an organization member
I have started a new coaching conversation
I am in the synthesis phase
I work on strategic bets
the coach should guide me through the format:
I am logged in as an organization member
I have started a new coaching conversation
I have formulated strategic bets
the conversation should move to the "planning" phase
the coach should help create action plans
the coach should discuss implementation priorities
I am logged in as an organization member
I have started a new coaching conversation
the conversation is in the "research" phase
I view the conversation in the list
I should see the phase badge showing "Research"

name: Strategy Coach Methodology

description:
As a product leader
  I want to have coaching conversations with an AI strategy coach
  So that I can develop effective product strategies

steps.name: I am logged in as an organization member
I am on the Strategy Coach page
I should see the page title "Strategy Coach"
I should see the coaching journey with 4 phases
I should see the "Start New Strategy Session" button
I am logged in as an organization member
I am on the Strategy Coach page
I should see the following phases:
I am logged in as an organization member
I am on the Strategy Coach page
I click the "Start New Strategy Session" button
I should be redirected to a new conversation page
I should see the chat interface
I should receive an opening message from the coach

elements.name: View empty state when no conversations exist

steps.name: I am logged in as an organization member
I am on the Strategy Coach page
I have no previous conversations
I should see the empty state message "No coaching sessions yet"
I should see the "Start New Strategy Session" button
I am logged in as an organization member
I am on the Strategy Coach page
I have the following conversations:
I should see "Previous Sessions" heading
I should see 2 conversation cards
I should see conversation "Q4 Strategy Review" with phase "Research"
I should see conversation "Product Roadmap" with phase "Discovery"
I am logged in as an organization member
I am on the Strategy Coach page
I have a conversation titled "Q4 Strategy Review"
I click on the conversation "Q4 Strategy Review"
I should be redirected to that conversation page
I should see the conversation title "Q4 Strategy Review"
I should see the previous messages

name: Strategy Coach Conversations

description:
As a product leader
  I want to send and receive messages with the AI coach
  So that I can get strategic guidance through conversation

elements.name: Send a message to the coach

steps.name: I am logged in as an organization member
I have an active coaching conversation
I am on the conversation page
I type "What should I focus on for my product strategy?"
I click the send button
my message should appear in the chat
I should see a streaming indicator
I should receive a response from the coach
I am logged in as an organization member
I have an active coaching conversation
I am on the conversation page
I type "Tell me about market research"
I press Enter
my message should appear in the chat
I should receive a response from the coach
I am logged in as an organization member
I have an active coaching conversation
I am on the conversation page
I type "First line"
I press Shift+Enter
I type "Second line"
the input should contain both lines
the message should not be sent
I am logged in as an organization member
I have an active coaching conversation
I am on the conversation page
I send a message "Explain the research pillars"
the input field should be disabled
the send button should show a loading state
the response is complete
the input field should be enabled
the send button should be ready
I am logged in as an organization member
I have an active coaching conversation
I am on the conversation page
there are 5 messages in the conversation
I send a message "New question"
the response is complete
the message count should show "7 messages"
I am logged in as an organization member
I have an active coaching conversation
I am on the conversation page
I type "My question here"
I click the send button
the input field should be empty
I am logged in as an organization member
I have an active coaching conversation
I am on the conversation page
the input field is empty
the send button should be disabled
I type "   "
the send button should be disabled
I am logged in as an organization member
I have an active coaching conversation
I am on the conversation page
I view a message in the chat
I should see a relative timestamp like "Just now" or "5m ago"
I am logged in as an organization member
I have an active coaching conversation
I am on the conversation page
there are many messages in the conversation
I receive a new message from the coach
the chat should scroll to show the new message

name: Strategy Coach Messaging

description:
As a product leader
  I want to navigate between conversations and pages
  So that I can easily access my coaching sessions

elements.name: Navigate from dashboard to Strategy Coach

steps.name: I am logged in as an organization member
I am on the dashboard
I navigate to Strategy Coach
I should be on the Strategy Coach page
I should see the breadcrumb showing "Dashboard > Strategy Coach"

elements.name: Navigate back from conversation to list

steps.name: I am logged in as an organization member
I am in a coaching conversation
I click the back button
I should be on the Strategy Coach page
I should see my previous conversations
I am logged in as an organization member
I am on the Strategy Coach page
I click "Dashboard" in the breadcrumb
I should be on the dashboard page
I am logged in as an organization member
I am in a coaching conversation
I have sent some messages
I navigate back to the conversation list
I open the same conversation
I should see all my previous messages

elements.name: Redirect to sign-in when not authenticated

steps.name: I am logged in as an organization member
I am not logged in
I try to access the Strategy Coach page
I should be redirected to the sign-in page

elements.name: Redirect to dashboard when no organization

steps.name: I am logged in as an organization member
I am logged in without an organization
I try to access the Strategy Coach page
I should be redirected to the dashboard

name: Strategy Coach Navigation
